name: Fashion, interior and industrial design
description: Within the Arts, this field is the study of creatively combining line, form, and materials in designing and constructing items like fashion garments, industrial products, and interiors. [cite: 69, 70]

name: Costume design
description: The creation of clothing and accessories for performers in theatre, film, or television, a specialization within Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]

name: Design of industrial products
description: Focuses on the artistic and functional design of manufactured goods, a part of Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]

name: Fashion design
description: The art of applying design, aesthetics, and natural beauty to clothing and accessories, a core component of Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]

name: Interior architecture
description: The design of interior spaces, focusing on architectural aspects, structural elements, and space planning, as part of Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]

name: Interior design
description: The art and science of enhancing the interior of a building to achieve a healthier and more aesthetically pleasing environment for the people using the space, within Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]

name: Stage designing
description: The creation of scenery, props, and overall visual environment for theatre, film, or television productions, a part of Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]

name: Window dressing
description: The art of arranging goods in a shop window to attract customers, a specialized area of design under Fashion, interior and industrial design. [cite: 70]
